point1: With over 2 years of experience as an AI Cyber Lab Researcher at Deepcytes, Darshan Jain has developed a Medical Deepfakes Detection Model and a General Purpose Deepfake detection Model, showcasing his expertise in AI and ML.
point2: Notable projects include Open Library, a web application utilizing Google Books API, and Is Your Flight Late?, a predictive model for flight delays using Gradio.
point3: Darshan Jain is proficient in a range of programming languages, including Python, C, JS, CSS, HTML, R, and MATLAB, as well as frameworks like React and Node JS.
point4: With a strong background in ML-OPS and BA, Darshan Jain has demonstrated expertise in Power BI Dashboard development and has a solid understanding of domain-specific tools like Gradio and Docker.
point5: As a versatile and ambitious candidate, Darshan Jain offers a unique blend of technical skills, industry knowledge, and soft skills, making him a valuable asset to any organization seeking innovative solutions.
